name: cognito-story
title: Cognito Story
author: Lloyd Richards <lloyd.d.richards@gmail.com>
description: AWS Cognito-style comprehensive authentication template with login, signup, password reset, email verification, and social login flows

files.content:

{enablePasswordToggle && ( )}
); /** * ğŸ¯ ëª©ì : í—¤ë” ì˜ì—­ì„ ë Œë”ë§ (ë¡œê³ , ì œëª©, ì„¤ëª…) */ const renderHeader = ( title: string, description: string, showBackButton = false, ) => ( {showBackButton && ( )} {logoUrl && (
